game.name: Saints Row 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Saints Row 2 brings true freedom to open-world gaming. Players can play as who they want, how they want, and with whomever they want in this sequel to the much acclaimed and tremendously successful Saints Row.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Saints Row 2 brings true freedom to open-world gaming. Players can play as who they want, how they want, and with whomever they want in this sequel to the much acclaimed and tremendously successful Saints Row.

reviewHighlights.text: 이거 겜 자체가 그타랑은 비교도 안될정도로 매곰함. 진짜 날 것 그 자체에 매콤함이 도파민 뿜뿜 하게 만듬. 갠적으론 리메이크 해줬으면 하는 작품.
